about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a captivating turn-based tactical RPG where you'll manage a band of mercenaries in a procedurally generated medieval fantasy world. Explore a vast and ever-changing landscape, make strategic decisions, and engage in battles to carve your path to glory.



Traverse the Outerlands with complete freedom, visit towns to recruit new allies, establish guild branches, and uncover hidden treasures. Carefully equip your mercenaries, selecting from a diverse array of powerful items and skills to customize their combat roles. With no rigid class system, the possibilities are endless.



Lead your mercenaries into intense turn-based tactical battles, where every move counts. Position your units strategically, exploit enemy weaknesses, and execute powerful attacks to emerge victorious. Each mercenary's unique background influences their proficiencies and traits, adding depth and complexity to your tactical decisions.



Encounter a dynamic travel event system that presents you with branching choices and a variety of outcomes. Your decisions will shape the narrative and influence the fate of your guild.



Unlock a world of modding possibilities, allowing you to customize the game to your liking. Create new adventures, introduce fresh gameplay elements, and share your creations with the community.


  • Manage a fantasy mercenary guild in a procedurally generated open world
  • Fight turn-based tactical battles with diverse equipment and skill choices
  • Recruit mercenaries with unique backgrounds that influence their proficiencies and traits
  • Customize your characters with no rigid class system
  • Experience a dynamic travel event system with branching choices and different outcomes
  • Explore a world of modding possibilities

content_descriptors.notes: The game have adult content in the form of violence display during the combat between the player and the enemy
